title: Vinodh Ilangovan's collection
description: A collection of work on the use of dance in science communication / public and patient engagement. This collection is still being set up.

submissions.comment: A collaborative project of a medical anthropologist and a contemporary dance choreographer to address embodied experiences of illness and recovery in women with eating disorder.

module.title: Choreographing lived experience: dance, feelings and the storytelling body
